skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

The Hermit does not die from hunger, for every day, peasants and shepherds travel a long way to give him flasks of wine, fresh bread, excellent local cheeses and quarters of venison. In return, he is the bastion between them and all the evils of the world, fulfilling the Knightly Vows every day of his existence.

ui_effects.localised_text: Triggers when a friendly spell is active.

skillTree.localised_description: Troubled as the Grail Chapel of Mount Malmont oft is by a pestilence of flying monsters, it bequeaths a special manner of defense upon those who stand guard.
The great beasts of the Massif Orcal are legend, but the Hermit Knight fears them not, for he has cut many of them down to a proper size in his long life as a Grail Knight.

The mountains of Massif Orcal have long been infested with Orcs and Goblins, and while some maintain that the various Holy Wars have scourged the vile creatures from the mountains, the Hermit Knight knows better, for it is not only Dragons whose skulls he has piled about the Chapel of the Grail.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +9 when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: While grey has long since taken over the beard and hair of the Hermit Knight, the Blessing of the Lady has allowed him to age like the finest of wines, growing in grace even as his body begins to show the signs of deterioration.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: In moments of extremis, the Lady may choose to shield the Hermit Knight from any harm whatsoever, for it is his duty to carry out her will.

ui_effects.localised_text: Unit is invulnerable to damage (does not apply to summoned units)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

items.colour_text: Sangdragon is an extremely reinvigorating wine that the peasants of the Massif Orcal produce. The Hermit Knight always takes a flask with him when he sets off on an adventure, for it restores his soul and boosts his fighting prowess, knowing that he is the bastion between the peasants and the cruel.

The Sword of Virtue is a huge two-handed sword, property of the Grail Chapel of Malmont. It seems to have been created for battling Dragons and other large monsters, especially those who can fly, for it drags them out of the sky and into the Hermit Knight's grasp.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: No one knows the true name of the Hermit of Malmont, nor the reasons that drove him to live as a recluse. He guards an isolated Grail Chapel on the slopes of Malmont, the great peak that overlooks the entire Massif Orcal. Despite his advanced age, he is still a Grail Knight, and thus a ferocious warrior. The skulls of many Dragons lining the mountain path are eloquent testimony to his martial valour. As soon as a Dragon captures a maiden, the Hermit comes to challenge him in his lair without any fear, and no damsel shall be abandoned as a meal for a litter of dragonlings as long as he and his powerful sword are in the area.

enabled_if: No friendly units in ability range.

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
